Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Command_Prompt_Basics.md:
# Command Prompt Basics

## Navigation
```
# Change directory
cd directory_name

# List files and directories
dir

# Change drive
D:
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.User_Accounts.md:
# User Accounts

## User Management
```
# Create a new user
net user username password /add

# Change user password
net user username new_password

# Delete a user
net user username /delete
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Task_Manager.md:
# Task Manager

## Managing Processes
```
# Open Task Manager
Ctrl + Shift + Esc

# End a process
Right-click on the process > End Task

# View system performance
Performance tab
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.File_Explorer_Tips.md:
# File Explorer Tips

## Quick Actions
```
# Rename a file
F2

# Copy selected items
Ctrl + C

# Paste copied items
Ctrl + V
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Networking_Commands.md:
# Networking Commands

## IP Configuration
```
# Display IP configuration
ipconfig

# Release and renew IP
ipconfig /release
ipconfig /renew
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.System_Info.md:
# System Information

## Display System Information
```
# System information
systeminfo

# Show currently logged-in users
query user
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.PowerShell_Basics.md:
# PowerShell Basics

## Running Scripts
```
# Allow script execution
Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned

# Run a PowerShell script
./script.ps1
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Security_Tips.md:
# Security Tips

## Windows Defender
```
# Update virus definitions
Update-MpSignature

# Run a quick scan
Start-MpScan -ScanType QuickScan

# Check for threats
Get-MpThreat
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Remote_Desktop.md:
# Remote Desktop

## Connect to Remote PC
```
# Open Remote Desktop Connection
mstsc

# Connect to a remote PC
Enter PC's IP or hostname
```

Windows_Cheat_Sheet.Windows_Update.md:
# Windows Update

## Manual Update
```
# Check for updates
Settings > Update & Security > Windows Update > Check for updates

# Install updates
Settings > Update & Security > Windows Update > Install updates
```
